title: To Riot, Moveable Mastery Pages.
body:
Riot, I beleive mastery pages should be moveable so you can keep it clean and not have to delete all of the pages in order to add a new page!
Would love to see this in the game.

replies.body:
I agree. It would be nice to customise runes just as one customises masteries. Not everyone has the IP or money to afford 5+ rune pages for different positions and lanes. 

I can understand if Rito wouldn't want this though since they are probably making money on the 7-rune page deal and if people were to customise prior to each game then people wouldn't go for some of the rune page RP deals. 

I support the changes though.
I would like to add that if you make them moveable you also include a lock feature as it could be an annoyance to accidentally move pages all the time. :)
Great too see how strongly people feel about this I tweeted this page at RIOT and maybe it can make a difference.
Riot have stated that they are working on a NEW client. Hopefully this involves fixing all of these little bugs we hate.
When I tried to save any changes in the masteries page, there always be an Error said "Unexpected Platform Error"!!!!! What's wrong? Now I have to modify the masteries every time before play!

It would be nice, But its not that hard to manage..

I use 4 pages per lane. and have 5 spare for testing.. I name them by the champ. 

With the recent season end it was a prefect time to re organise.

i dont understand how this could be so hard to implement. it doesnt even have to be drag and drop you can move it giving numerical value inputs or making a page a certain number then driving the others down a value........ok please make it drag and drop

also rune pages too plz
Riot could do a whole lot better with masteries!
Drives me absolutely bonkers... Please Riot!
Even better: add the initials or add an icon instead of numbers so you can differentiate their tabs without memorizing it.
